DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Evaluate Effectiveness Hairfinity Improving Hair Health Rate Growth
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female 1850 year age ( inclusive ) 2 . Subject child bear potential . Defined female hysterectomy oophorectomy , bilateral tubal ligation postmenopausal ( natural surgically > 1 year since last menstruation ) . OR Female subject childbearing potential must agree use medically approve method birth control negative urine pregnancy test result . Acceptable method birth control include : Hormonal contraceptive include oral contraceptive , hormone birth control patch ( Ortho Evra ) , vaginal contraceptive ring ( NuvaRing ) , injectable contraceptive ( DepoProvera , Lunelle ) , hormone implant ( Norplant System ) Intrauterine device Vasectomy partner Double Barrier Method Nonheterosexual lifestyle 3 . Women begin hormonal birth control hormone replacement within 6 month randomization 3 . Subjects underwent form treatment thin hair , include prescription drug light therapy within 6 month randomization 6 .
